heroine.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a woman who is admired for doing something extremely brave
heroine.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: a heroine of the French Resistance
heroine.translation[0].definitions[1].de: the woman or girl who is the main character in a book, film, play etc
heroine.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Mira, the fictional heroine of ‘The Women’s Room’
heroine.translation[0].definitions[2].de: a woman who is admired very much for a particular skill or quality
